resources.string: Welcome, sign in to your google account

In USA, about 28,131 lbs of CO2e or about 44% of a carbon footprint of an average American is associated with home electricity use. You can greatly reduce your carbon footprint by switching to renewable energy such as solar power.

Many of our daily activities cause rise in greenhouse gases. This app calculates your carbon foot print over time. By calculating your daily emissions, we are able to forecast a model for your future emissions. We can shows areas where you can cut and what effects those areas will have.
